title: Vietnam Airlines Business class plays golf for free
text:
5, 2015 
Vietnam Airlines Business class will receive incentives of playing golf for free after flights to Nha Trang or Phu Quoc this autumn. Accordingly, customers of Vietnam Airline will also enjoy the best service in two most famous islands in Vietnam. 
Not just improving the quality of flights, Vietnam Airlines also proves its profession of a reputable national airline when launching a special promotion towards the ultimate benefit of customers. Recently, the airline brings many surprises to Business class when giving them meaningful presents. 
Vietnam Airlines preferential policies 
According to the official announcement of Vietnam Airline , passengers of Business class on Vietnam Airlines flights to Nha Trang, Phu Quoc will receive special incentives: 
- Free of charge for using a golf course of 18 holes during September 2015 
- 50% discount charge (on public rate) of using a golf course from October to December 2015 
Conditions: 
- Boarding pass has the validity of 05 days to play golf since the date of departure. 
- Customers have to show their valid boarding passes and personal documents at the resception desk of Vinpearl Golf Course. 
- Boarding passes of Vietnam Airlines flights to Nha Trang are only used at Vinpearl Golf Nha Trang. Those in flights to Phu Quoc are used at Vipearl Golf Phu Quoc. 
- The promtion of Vietnam Airways is not combined with other programs or promotional packages of VinGroup. 
This is a great chances for Vietnam Air customers to experience ralaxing moments at international golf courses in Vietnam. Besides, Vietnam Airlines Business class will have chance to take rest after a busy meeting day in Nha Trang or Phu Quoc. 
Vinpearl Golf Phu Quoc 
Vinpearl Golf Phu Quoc has an area of over 100ha. The golf course is designed in the model of famous sea – island golf courses in the world with beautiful natural landscapes. Being designed uniquely, taking the maximum advantages of natural landscapes and seascapes, Vinpearl Golf Phu Quoc is an attractive course for golfers to challenge themselves and mark scores over their competitors. In addition, Vinpearl Golf Phu Quoc is the convergence of full equipment to meet all demand of a holiday with luxur 5-star hotels, opulent villas, large swimming pool, elegant Vincharm Spa system, and an amusement park seen as “Phu Quoc Disneyland”. 
Vinpearl Golf Nha Trang 
With an advantage of being located in Hon Tre Island in Nha Trang, one of the most beautiful bays in the world, international 18-hole golf course in Nha Trang will be an ideal place to bring interesting experiences to fans of the noble sport. Vinpearl Golf Nha Trang has a featured design, perfect services, also a series of luxury restaurants, resorts, amusement park... bringing wonderful holidays to passengers.
